name: Stickman Jump:Adventure World - Free Puzzle Game
name_original: Stickman Jump:Adventure World - Free Puzzle Game
description:
Play as a stickman who wants to travel and see the world!
The whole game environment is interactive,you need to find a way towards next stage by solving various mysteries.
Analyze the situation and click hidden different switches to unlock various passages.

Collect all the coins as you travel the world! Good Luck!
